name: eslint-config
author: Seiyial <seiyial@seiyial.xyz>
description: Opiniated configs for various setups; sets up the linting pretty well without the need for prettierJS.

scripts.postinstall: echo 'If you are using React, you\'ll also need to run this:\n   yarn add --dev -E eslint-plugin-react eslint-plugin-react-hooks'
